response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $800,000. This is a unique chance to secure such a high-quality product at a highly favorable rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 800000}
